/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The viewer's perspective is that of a pedestrian standing on the sidewalk, looking down the length of the street. The street itself is flanked by lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. Power lines crisscross above, forming a network against the backdrop of the clear blue sky. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. A white truck is parked on the right side of the street, adding a touch of modern life to the scene. The sun shines brightly overhead, casting long shadows and bathing the entire scene in a warm, inviting light. The image is a beautiful blend of urban and natural elements, showcasing the harmonious coexistence of nature and city life in Beijing.
